00033 
00034 #ifndef __ASSEMBLER__
00035 
00036 int __ftoa_engine (double val, char *buf,
00037                    unsigned char prec, unsigned char maxdgs);
00038 
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 /* '__ftoa_engine' return next flags (in buf[0]):       */
00042 #define FTOA_MINUS      1
00043 #define FTOA_ZERO       2
00044 #define FTOA_INF        4
00045 #define FTOA_NAN        8
00046 #define FTOA_CARRY      16      /* Carry was to master position.        */
00047 
00048 #endif  /* !_FTOA_ENGINE_H */
